songs.title: Just Because
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
Hoe, I'm too fly for you, you know that
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
I'm too fly for you, you know that
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
You see the Goyard hangin' 'round my hand, man
Oh yeah, oh yeah
I'm too fly for you, you know that
Oh yeah

[Verse 1]
I might just wake up and go co pa Rari just because
I might tell my ex bitch sorry just because
I'm in the studio right now goin' up
When I was down bad bad, I was still up
Aye look, broke niggas keep up, I kick my feet up
Make your hoe speed up, make your hoe speed up
He got on Supreme, she got on Céline
I got on Burberry, I know this shit too scary

[Hook]
Hoe, I'm too fly for you, you know that
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
I'm too fly for you, you know that
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
You see the Goyard hangin' 'round my hand, man
Oh yeah, oh yeah
I'm too fly for you, you know that
Oh yeah

[Verse 2]
I'm too elite, she a freak
So I might smash her everyday of the week
I got the key, put this on the beat
I'mma love her if she only want me
They hate it when I'm saucin', I do this shit often
I should be a mannequin, I put 'em in a coffin
I put that dick in her throat, i'll have her coughin'
Only hit her once and I got that hoe callin'

[Hook]
Hoe, I'm too fly for you, you know that
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
I'm too fly for you, you know that
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
You see the Goyard hangin' 'round my hand, man
Oh yeah, oh yeah
I'm too fly for you, you know that
Oh yeah
